title: Create a Mantine Nextjs Application for Nx
description: Create a Mantine Nextjs for an Nx workspace.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the library?

directory.description: A directory where the lib is placed

simpleModuleName.description: Keep the module name simple (when using `--directory`).

tags.description: Add tags to the library (used for linting).

importPath.description: The library name used to import it, like `@myorg/my-awesome-lib`. Must be a valid npm name.

rootDir.description: Sets the `rootDir` for TypeScript compilation. When not defined, it uses the project's root property, or `srcRootForCompilationRoot` if it is defined.
